text: unsigned long rec_func ( int , int ) ; int mat [ 100 ] [ 100 ] , no_of_lines ; int main ( ) { int i , j , k , t , n ; scanf ( "%d" , & t ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < t ; i ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , & no_of_lines ) ; for ( j = 0 ; j < no_of_lines ; j ++ ) { for ( k = 0 ; k <= j ; k ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; mat [ j ] [ k ] = n ; } } printf ( "%ld\n" , rec_func ( 0 , 0 ) ) ; } return 0 ; } unsigned long rec_func ( int i , int j ) { unsigned long sum1 , sum2 ; if ( i < no_of_lines && j < no_of_lines ) { sum1 = rec_func ( i + 1 , j ) ; sum2 = rec_func ( i + 1 , j + 1 ) ; if ( sum1 > sum2 ) return sum1 + mat [ i ] [ j ] ; else return sum2 + mat [ i ] [ j ] ; } else return 0 ; }
